channel.title: Istanbul on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Istanbul on My New Hugo Site

item.title: A Taste of Istanbul’s Maritime Heritage: My Kumkapı Balık Pazarı Adventure;
item.description: Nestled along the Marmara Sea in the heart of Istanbul, the Kumkapı Balık Pazarı (Kumkapı Fish Market) is more than just a market—it’s a living testament to the city’s deep connection to the sea. For centuries, this vibrant neighborhood has been a hub for fishermen, merchants, and food lovers, offering some of the freshest seafood in the world. As someone who loves exploring culinary traditions, I couldn’t resist visiting this iconic market during my time in Istanbul.

item.title: Welcome to N Design Studyosu;
item.description:
At NDesignStudio & Affiliate Partners, we work with you to optimize your business from the top down. As an award-winning design Studio, our group of professional engineers and social media content planners are always here to help your business get off the ground and grow.

Meet Nemah;the founder of the Studio; she has a masters of marketing from Marmara University, Istanbul, Türkiye.Your Personal Branding and Design Expert; She is an experienced systems and network engineer and front-end designer with 7 years of experience. Experienced in analyzing software features and sales and marketing for them. Excited to help your company in branding and expanding online presence via social media engagement with captivating content, video and static assets. She is Scrum methodologies associate and Agile track follower.. Certified in Turkish Labor Law;
